sorular.soru: When are you allowed to stop here?
cevaplar: When you want to ask for directions.
When you want to pick up a hitchhiker.
When you want to reset the navigation.
When you want to unload a heavy package.
When you want to drop off a passenger.
dogruCevap: When you want to pick up a hitchhiker.
When you want to drop off a passenger.

feedback.metin: You are only allowed to stop at a bus stop to drop off or pick up passengers. This means you are also allowed to pick up a hitchhiker. But it is not allowed to stop to unload a heavy package, to ask directions or to reset the navigation.

sorular.soru: Which vehicles fall under the category motor vehicles?

feedback.metin: Motor vehicles are all motorised vehicles except vehicles that use a track (train, metro, tram), mopeds and disabled vehicles.

sorular.soru: Who should you give way to while exiting this street?

feedback.metin: While exiting an exit construction, you should give way to all other traffic. This means not only all drivers, but also pedestrians.
